search.query: | getversions | lookup versionstatus version | rex field=version "(?<v_M>\d+)\.(?<v_m>\d+)\.(?<v_mm>\d+)" | eval v_M=tonumber(v_M), v_m=tonumber(v_m), v_mm=tonumber(v_mm) | sort -v_M, -v_m, -v_mm | table status version | where status=1

table.title: Click a virtual environment to see its packages

search.query: | getvenvs | eval action=1 | table action environment version | append [| makeresults count=1 | eval action=0 | eval environment="$env_name$" | table action environment]

table.title: Click a package to be taken to its PyPI description

search.query: | pip environment=$env_clicked$ freeze | eval pv=split(messages, "==") | eval package=mvindex(pv, 0), version=mvindex(pv, 1) | table package version
